lines.text: Who are you, and what are you doing in here?
Well... we came up here to break your neck.
Wait a minute! That's before we saw you.
You see, we live in the room below. We was rehearsing our act, but you were dancing and...

[pointing to a spot on his head]
The chandelier hit me in the head.
That's no lump, that's my head.
Niagara Falls! Slowly I turn... step by step... inch by inch...
